description: Think tender beef with crunchy coleslaw wrapped in a fluffy tortilla. Follow this easy recipe to have tasty tortilla pockets in your hands in 20 minutes.
keywords: Beef wrap,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Fakeaway,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Beef & Coleslaw Tortilla Pockets Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 30g Old El Paso taco spice mix

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs extra virgin olive oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Add mince and cook, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 8 minutes or until well browned.
Meanwhile, prepare coleslaw according to packet instructions. Warm tortillas according to packet instructions. Wrap tortillas in foil to keep warm and set aside.
Reduce heat to medium. Add spice mix and 3/4 cup water, stirring to combine. Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly.
Fill tortillas with mince mixture and a little coleslaw. Serve with remaining coleslaw.
